  • Method Details

    • newVertex

      Vertex newVertex(String label, double weight)
      This function creates a new vertex with the given label and weight and returns it
      Parameters:
      label - The name of the vertex.
      weight - the weight of the vertex
      Returns:
      A new vertex with the label, weight, and numVertex.

    • addVertex

      void addVertex(Vertex new_vertex)
      It adds a vertex to the graph
      Parameters:
      new_vertex - The vertex to be added to the graph

    • addEdge

      boolean addEdge(int vertexID1, int vertexID2, double weight)
      It adds an edge between two vertices
      Parameters:
      vertexID1 - The ID of the first vertex.
      vertexID2 - The ID of the vertex that the edge will be connected to.
      weight - the weight of the edge

    • removeEdge

      boolean removeEdge(int vertexID1, int vertexID2)
      It removes the given edge on graph
      Parameters:
      vertexID1 - The ID of the first vertex.
      vertexID2 - The ID of the vertex that is the destination of the edge.
      Returns:
      The method returns true if edge deleted,returns false otherwise

    • removeVertex

      Vertex removeVertex(int vertexID)
      It removes a vertex from the graph by setting the vertex to null and removing all edges that point to the vertex
      Parameters:
      vertexID - The ID of the vertex to be removed.
      Returns:
      The removed vertex.

    • removeVertex

      Vertex removeVertex(String label)
      It removes a vertex from the graph by removing it from the vertexs list and then removing all edges that are connected to it
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the vertex to be removed
      Returns:
      The removed vertex.

    • filterVertices

      Graph filterVertices(String key, String filter)
      It creates a new graph, and adds the vertices and their edges that have the given property to the new graph
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the property to be filtered.
      filter - The value of the property that the vertex must have to be included in the filtered graph.
      Returns:
      A new graph with the filtered vertices.

    • exportMatrix

      Double[][] exportMatrix()
      It takes a graph and returns a matrix representation of the graph
      Returns:
      A 2D array of Edge weights.

    • printGraph

      void printGraph()
      It prints the graph in sourceVertex -> destinationVertex (Weight of edge) format
